job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Report
       Strategies to transition to the new stage of data and AI
     * eBook
       Discover how to build and manage all your data, analytics and AI use cases.
     * Report
       Scaling AI: Key Data Priorities
       Findings from 600 CIOs across 14 industries
     * August-November 2023
       Generation AI is coming to you! Join us to explore all things data, analytics and AI on Lakehouse.
     * Generative AI Fundamentals
       Build foundational knowledge, including how to use LLMs in your organization, with 4 videos
     * Ready to get started?
       Sr. Spark Technical Solutions Engineer
       Amsterdam, Netherlands
       CSQ125R3
       As a Senior Spark Technical Solutions Engineer, you will provide technical and consulting related solutions for the challenging Spark/ML/AI/Delta/Streaming/Lakehouse reported issues by our customers and resolve any challenges involving the Databricks unified analytics platform with your comprehensive technical and client-facing skills. You will assist our customers in their Databricks journey and provide them with the guidance and expertise that they need to accomplish value and achieve their strategic goals using our products. You will join the EMEA Technical Solutions team based in Amsterdam, Netherlands reporting to the Manager of Spark Technical Solutions.
       The impact you will have:
     * Provide best practices guidance for custom-built solutions developed by Databricks customers.
     * Troubleshoot, resolve and suggest deep code-level analysis of Spark to address customer issues related to Spark core internals, Spark SQL, Structured Streaming, Delta, Lakehouse and other Databricks runtime features.
     * Assist the customers in setting up reproducible Spark problems with solutions in the areas of Spark SQL, Delta, Memory Management, Performance tuning, Streaming, Data Science and Data Integration areas in Spark.
     * Work with Account Executives, Solutions Architects and Professional Services for coordinating customer issues and best practices guidelines.
     * Coordinate with Engineering and Backline Support teams to help report Product defects.
     * Help create company documentation and knowledge articles.
     * Participate in weekend (infrequent) and weekday (normal business hrs) on-call rotation.
job_details.full_text:
Sr. Spark Technical Solutions Engineer

* Report
       Strategies to transition to the new stage of data and AI
     * eBook
       Discover how to build and manage all your data, analytics and AI use cases.
     * Report
       Scaling AI: Key Data Priorities
       Findings from 600 CIOs across 14 industries
     * August-November 2023
       Generation AI is coming to you! Join us to explore all things data, analytics and AI on Lakehouse.
     * Generative AI Fundamentals
       Build foundational knowledge, including how to use LLMs in your organization, with 4 videos
     * Ready to get started?
       Sr. Spark Technical Solutions Engineer
       Amsterdam, Netherlands
       CSQ125R3
       As a Senior Spark Technical Solutions Engineer, you will provide technical and consulting related solutions for the challenging Spark/ML/AI/Delta/Streaming/Lakehouse reported issues by our customers and resolve any challenges involving the Databricks unified analytics platform with your comprehensive technical and client-facing skills. You will assist our customers in their Databricks journey and provide them with the guidance and expertise that they need to accomplish value and achieve their strategic goals using our products. You will join the EMEA Technical Solutions team based in Amsterdam, Netherlands reporting to the Manager of Spark Technical Solutions.
       The impact you will have:
     * Provide best practices guidance for custom-built solutions developed by Databricks customers.
     * Troubleshoot, resolve and suggest deep code-level analysis of Spark to address customer issues related to Spark core internals, Spark SQL, Structured Streaming, Delta, Lakehouse and other Databricks runtime features.
     * Assist the customers in setting up reproducible Spark problems with solutions in the areas of Spark SQL, Delta, Memory Management, Performance tuning, Streaming, Data Science and Data Integration areas in Spark.
     * Work with Account Executives, Solutions Architects and Professional Services for coordinating customer issues and best practices guidelines.
     * Coordinate with Engineering and Backline Support teams to help report Product defects.
     * Help create company documentation and knowledge articles.
     * Participate in weekend (infrequent) and weekday (normal business hrs) on-call rotation.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes providing technical and consulting solutions for issues related to Spark, ML, AI, Delta, Streaming, and the Databricks platform. It involves deep code-level analysis of Spark internals, performance tuning, and assisting customers with data science and data integration challenges within the Spark ecosystem. While Generative AI is mentioned, the core focus is on the broader Spark/ML/AI platform, data engineering, and productionizing solutions, aligning more closely with the responsibilities of an ML Engineer who deals with data-driven predictive models and MLOps within a platform context, rather than a GenAI Engineer focused on LLMs and generative applications.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves assisting customers in setting up reproducible Spark problems with solutions in areas like Spark SQL, Delta, Memory Management, Performance tuning, Streaming, Data Science, and Data Integration, which are core to data engineering and pipeline management.
job_tasks.phrase: Assist the customers in setting up reproducible Spark problems with solutions in the areas of Spark SQL, Delta, Memory Management, Performance tuning, Streaming, Data Science and Data Integration areas in Spark.

job_tasks.justification: The role requires troubleshooting and resolving issues related to Spark core internals, Spark SQL, Structured Streaming, Delta, Lakehouse, and other Databricks runtime features, which are all components of a data platform.
job_tasks.phrase: Troubleshoot, resolve and suggest deep code-level analysis of Spark to address customer issues related to Spark core internals, Spark SQL, Structured Streaming, Delta, Lakehouse and other Databricks runtime features.

job_tasks.justification: The job description mentions 'ML/AI' in the context of reported issues and customer journeys, indicating involvement with machine learning and artificial intelligence models, even if the primary focus is on the platform supporting them.
job_tasks.phrase: provide technical and consulting related solutions for the challenging Spark/ML/AI/Delta/Streaming/Lakehouse reported issues

job_tasks.justification: The role involves providing best practices guidance for custom-built solutions developed by Databricks customers, which implies understanding and advising on the software development aspects of their AI/ML implementations.
job_tasks.phrase: Provide best practices guidance for custom-built solutions developed by Databricks customers.

job_tasks.justification: The role requires deep code-level analysis and suggesting solutions for customer issues, which involves understanding and potentially modifying code related to Spark and its components.
job_tasks.phrase: suggest deep code-level analysis of Spark to address customer issues

job_tasks.justification: The role involves troubleshooting and resolving issues on the Databricks unified analytics platform, which is a production environment for data and AI workloads, and coordinating with Engineering and Backline Support to report product defects, aligning with operational aspects of maintaining such a platform.
job_tasks.phrase: resolve any challenges involving the Databricks unified analytics platform

job_tasks.justification: The role includes participating in on-call rotations, which is a common responsibility in operations engineering to ensure the continuous availability and performance of systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Participate in weekend (infrequent) and weekday (normal business hrs) on-call rotation.

job_tasks.justification: The role aims to assist customers in their Databricks journey and provide guidance to help them achieve value and strategic goals using the products, indicating a need to understand customer business objectives.
job_tasks.phrase: provide them with the guidance and expertise that they need to accomplish value and achieve their strategic goals using our products.

soft_skills.phrase: Work with Account Executives, Solutions Architects and Professional Services for coordinating customer issues
Troubleshoot, resolve and suggest deep code-level analysis
assist our customers in their Databricks journey
